comments.text: Running make install should install a useful .desktop file.  As part of bug 639884, there is a static desktop file that gets copied in as part of the specfile.  This should be done as part of the normal install target.
comments.author: jhford@mozilla.com
comments.creator: jhford@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: Running make install should install a useful .desktop file.  As part of bug 639884, there is a static desktop file that gets copied in as part of the specfile.  This should be done as part of the normal install target.
I filed Bug 296568 about this issue way back.
comments.author: nulldomain@gmail.com
